header.title: Data Management
header.abstract: Simal uses an RDF repository to manage its data. This document describes how data is handled on ingest and how it can be accessed using the API.

body.warning: This document describes intended functionality in the 0.3 release of Simal. Not all features described within it have been implemented.

section.title: Overview
section.p: Simal allows data about an entity can be collected from multiple sources and then retrieved according to a hierarchy of preferred data sources. This allows an application to retrieve the most appropriate data available whilst still ensuring that all data known about an entity is available to it.

section.title: Selecting the Preferred Data Source
section.p: When a second data source is imported Simal records the second source, using an rdf:sameAs element, in the internal Simal entity description.
